duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform preventative maintenance, installations, troubleshooting, and repairs on medical equipment within a hospital or healthcare system.
Maintain relationships with customers, ensure timely communication, resolution, and proper follow-up to drive customer satisfaction.
Adhere to company policies, procedures, and hospital protocols to ensure regulatory and compliance requirements are met; ensure documentation of all work performed is captured.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree, Bachelor's degree, Military education, or High School Diploma / GED with 4+ years’ experience servicing electronic equipment.
Legal authorization to work in the U.S.
